description: When the port state becomes shutdown, a notification is sent
to the Management Entity with the LBD-state
information.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ALCATEL-IND1-LBD-MIB::alaLbdStateChangeToShutdown ALCATEL-IND1-LBD-MIB::alaLbdPortIfIndex i 9999 ALCATEL-IND1-LBD-MIB::alaLbdPreviousState i 1 ALCATEL-IND1-LBD-MIB::alaLbdCurrentState i 1

description: The ifIndex of the port on which LBD trap is raised
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-LBD-MIB::alaLbdPortIfIndex

description: The previous state of the port on which LBD was running.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-LBD-MIB::alaLbdPreviousState

description: The current state of the port on which LBD was running.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-LBD-MIB::alaLbdCurrentState

description: When the the port state changes from shutdown due to
clear-violation-all, a notification is sent to the Management
Entity, with the LBD-state information.
The ifIndex of the port on which LBD trap is raised
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-LBD-MIB::alaLbdPortIfIndex

description: The state of the the port where LBD was running
before clear-violation-all applied.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-LBD-MIB::alaLbdPreviousStateClearViolationAll

description: The state of the the port where LBD was running
after clear-violation-all applied.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-LBD-MIB::alaLbdCurrentStateClearViolationAll

description: When the port state changes from shutdown due to auto-recovery
mechanism, a notification is sent to the Management Entity
with the LBD-state information.
The ifIndex of the port on which LBD trap is raised
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-LBD-MIB::alaLbdPortIfIndex

description: The state of the the port where LBD was running
before auto-recovery.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-LBD-MIB::alaLbdPreviousStateAutoRecovery

description: The state of the the port where LBD was running
after auto-recovery.
variables.name: ALCATEL-IND1-LBD-MIB::alaLbdCurrentStateAutoRecovery
